div.p: 1880, 30 M. Notes mss. Pars I et II dans un volume. Au haut du 1er f. du 1er vol.: Ad. P. P. Franciscanos Vellhausij. Bib.». Rel anc. pour le 1er vol. 3e vol. incomplet, manque ff. 1 et 2. A l’ intérieur du 1er plat du 2° et 3e vol. exlibris avec la devise:« Honos Erit huic quoque Luto.», et en bas:« Andreae Felicis OEfely. Monacensis.» 476 VINCENTIUSVINCENTIUS BELLOVACENSIS: Speculum historiale, Pars I- IV. Copinger III. 6245, Madsen 4160, Proctor 254, Voulliéme: Berlin2131; Walter: Sélestat497. K 3721. Prov.; Don de la ville de Trèves, 1871, dont le cachet se trouve au bas du 1er f. Rel. anc. Notes mss. 2e ex. K. 3721a. Prov.; Don d’ Oswald Ottendorfer, New-York, 31. VII. 1885. A l’ intérieur du 1er plat, fiche découpée d’ un catalogue anglais: First edition... large initial, coloured let¬ ters leightened with gold,... a most splendid specimen of printing in its very earliest infancy. Very fine copy. Original stamped monastic binding.... Dibdin and other bibliographers state that it was printed at Strasburyby J. Mentelinabout the year 1470, although a previous possessor has titled it« Faust, Mayence1474.» It is excessively rare, and no copy exists in the British Museum or the Spencer Library. This volume formed part of the treasures of the late library at Strasburg, which was entirely destroyed during the late seige. This and a very few other volumes alone being saved from total destruction. It ought to be in a national library.» Au verso du f. de garde:« Editio antiquissima, typis Mentellianis impressa. Cat. Palm V, n° 1862. Liber rarissimus. Theod. de Mann( 2) pos.» Rel, anc. 477 VINCENTIUSVINCENTIUS BELLOVACENSISPSEUDO-: Speculum morale. ( Strasbourg, J. Mentelin, pas après 9 nov.1476), in- fol. Copinger 6252, Proctor 214, Madsen 4162, Voulliéme: Berlin 2109, Schorbach: N° 37. K 3729. Prov.: Bibl. F. A. Menke, Brême, 1873. Notes mss. 478 VINCENTIUSVINCENTIUS BELLOVACENSIS: Speculum naturale.( Stras¬ bourg, impr. R.(— Ad. Rusch), vers 1470), in- fol. Copinger III. 6256, Madsen 4166, Proctor 255, Voulliéme: Ber¬ lin 2132. Walter; Sélestat499. 100
